name: Qwixx Scorecard
description:
The premium Qwixx scorecard

Qwixx is a popular and fantastic dice game. The downside? Those annoying paper score cards. So score it on your phone or tablet instead!

- Score your Qwixx game automatically as you go. No more head math!

- Simple to use. Just open the app and start scoring

- No sign-ups, log ins, or personal information needed

- Works on any iPhone or iPad screen size
